Container.Name: binhex-bitmagnet
Container.Overview: A self-hosted BitTorrent indexer, DHT crawler, content classifier and torrent search engine with web UI, GraphQL API and Servarr stack integration.
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D

Config.Name: Port: Web Interface
Config.Description: This is the Web UI port for the application.

Config.Name: Port: Bittorrent TCP
Config.Description: This is the bittorrent TCP port used by the application.

Config.Name: Port: Bittorrent UDP
Config.Description: This is the bittorrent UDP port used by the application.

Config.Name: Port: Postgres
Config.Description: This is the port for Postgres, this is optional.

Config.Name: Path: /config
Config.Description: This is the container path to your configuration files, e.g. databases, configuration files, logs etc.

Config.Name: Variable: POSTGRES_VACUUM_DB
Config.Description: Enable or disable database vacuuming for BitMagnet.

Config.Name: Variable: POSTGRES_REINDEX_DB
Config.Description: Enable or disable database reindexing for BitMagnet.

Config.Name: Variable: TMDB_API_KEY
Config.Description: Specify your TMDB API key, if you do not specify your own key then a default key will be used which may result in slower indexing due to rate limiting.

Config.Name: Variable: PROCESSOR_CONCURRENCY
Config.Description: Defines the maximum number of torrents to be processed/classified simultaneously. The default setting of 1 aims to support the widest range of systems. Increasing the setting (for example to 3) may improve throughput of the processor queue but is known to cause slowdowns on less powerful systems.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_COMMAND
Config.Description: The command to execute in the healthcheck script, if not specified this will be DNS and HTTPS checks against google.com.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_ACTION
Config.Description: The action to execute if the healthcheck command returns a non zero exit code, if not specified the action will be 'exit 1', if you want the container to exit on failure then set the action to 'kill 1'.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_HOSTNAME
Config.Description: The hostname used when performing HTTPS and DNS healthchecking.

Config.Name: Variable: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for the running container

Config.Name: Variable: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for the running container
